law.catch_line: Percentage reduction in allotments in case of insufficient appropriation by General Assembly.
law.text: If, when the apportionments are being determined under the provisions of KRS 157.310 to 157.440, funds appropriated by the General Assembly to the public school fund are insufficient to provide the amount of money required under KRS 157.390, the chief state school officer, unless otherwise provided by the General Assembly in a budget bill, shall make a percentage reduction in the allotments to reduce the total of these allotments to funds available.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. III, sec. 101, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 410, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 6, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 32, effective July 1, 1976.
